name: Hybrid Embeddings Vector DB Outbound Connector
description: Embed and download documents with vector databases

properties.label: Operation
properties.description: Select operation

properties.label: Search query
properties.description: Document lookup query

properties.label: Max results
properties.description: Limit number of returned results

properties.label: Min score
properties.description: Minimal vector similarity score for result to be included. Must be between 0 and 1 floating point value, e.g. 0.6. Incorrect and empty value resolves to 0.0

properties.label: Model provider
properties.description: Select embedding model provider

properties.label: Endpoint
properties.description: Specify Azure OpenAI endpoint. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authentication
properties.description: Specify the Azure OpenAI authentication strategy.

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Secret of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra tenant. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authority host
properties.description: Authority host URL for the Microsoft Entra application. Defaults to https://login.microsoftonline.com. This can also contain an OAuth 2.0 token endpoint.

properties.label: Model deployment name
properties.description: Specify the model deployment name. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Embedding dimensions
properties.description: The size of the vector used to represent data. If not specified, the default model dimensions are used. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Max retries
properties.description: Max retries

properties.label: Custom headers
properties.description: Map of custom HTTP headers to add to the request.

properties.label: Access key
properties.description: Provide an IAM access key tailored to a user, equipped with the necessary permissions

properties.label: Secret key
properties.description: Provide a secret key associated with the access key

properties.label: Region
properties.description: AWS Bedrock region

properties.label: Model name
properties.description: Bedrock model name or identifier

properties.label: Embedding dimensions
properties.description: The size of the vector used to represent data

properties.label: Normalize
properties.description: Normalize vector

properties.label: Max retries
properties.description: Max retries

properties.label: Project ID
properties.description: Google Cloud project ID

properties.label: Region
properties.description: Google Cloud region for Vertex AI

properties.label: Authentication
properties.description: Specify the Google Vertex AI authentication strategy.

properties.label: JSON key of the service account
properties.description: This is the key of the service account in JSON format.

properties.label: Model name
properties.description: Vertex AI embedding model name

properties.label: Embedding dimensions
properties.description: The size of the vector used to represent data. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Publisher
properties.description: The publisher of the Vertex AI model (e.g., 'google', 'third-party'). Optional.

properties.label: Max retries
properties.description: Max retries

properties.label: Model name
properties.description: Specify the model name. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Organization ID
properties.description: For members of multiple organizations. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Project ID
properties.description: For accounts with multiple projects. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Embedding dimensions
properties.description: The size of the vector used to represent data. If not specified, the default model dimensions are used. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Max retries
properties.description: Max retries

properties.label: Custom headers
properties.description: Map of custom HTTP headers to add to the request.

properties.label: Custom base URL
properties.tooltip: Base URL of OpenAI API. The default is 'https://api.openai.com/v1/'

properties.label: Embeddings store
properties.description: Select embedding store

properties.label: Access key
properties.description: Provide an IAM access key tailored to a user, equipped with the necessary permissions

properties.label: Secret key
properties.description: Provide a secret key associated with the access key

properties.label: Server URL
properties.description: Provide a fully qualified server URL

properties.label: Region
properties.description: Provide an instance region

properties.label: Index name
properties.description: Provide an index to store embeddings

properties.label: Endpoint
properties.description: Specify Azure AI Search endpoint. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authentication
properties.description: Specify the Azure OpenAI authentication strategy.

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Secret of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra tenant. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authority host
properties.description: Authority host URL for the Microsoft Entra application. Defaults to https://login.microsoftonline.com. This can also contain an OAuth 2.0 token endpoint.

properties.label: Index name
properties.description: The name of the search index. When storing embeddings this index is created or updated automatically.

properties.label: Endpoint
properties.description: Specify Azure Cosmos DB endpoint. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authentication
properties.description: Specify the Azure OpenAI authentication strategy.

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Secret of a Microsoft Entra application

properties.label: Tenant ID
properties.description: ID of a Microsoft Entra tenant. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Authority host
properties.description: Authority host URL for the Microsoft Entra application. Defaults to https://login.microsoftonline.com. This can also contain an OAuth 2.0 token endpoint.

properties.label: Database name
properties.description: Specify the name of the Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL database.

properties.label: Container name
properties.description: Specify the name of the Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL container.

properties.label: Consistency level
properties.description: Specify the consistency level for the Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL store.

properties.label: Distance function
properties.description: The metric used to compute distance/similarity. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Vector index type
properties.description: The type of vector index type to use. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Base URL
properties.description: Elasticsearch base URL, i.e. http(s)://host:port

properties.label: Username
properties.description: Elasticsearch username

properties.label: Password
properties.description: Elasticsearch password

properties.label: Index name
properties.description: Elasticsearch index

properties.label: Base URL
properties.description: OpenSearch base URL, i.e. http(s)://host:port

properties.label: Username
properties.description: OpenSearch username

properties.label: Password
properties.description: OpenSearch password

properties.label: Index name
properties.description: OpenSearch index

properties.label: Document source
properties.description: Whether you want to embed a Camunda document file or plain text

properties.label: Max chars
properties.description: Max splitting segment size in chars

properties.label: Max overlap window
properties.description: Max segment splitting overlap size in chars

properties.label: Version
properties.description: Version of the element template

properties.label: ID
properties.description: ID of the element template

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
